tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE data_cleansing_transformations (
	id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
	input_data JSON,
	cleansed_data JSON,
	transformation_type VARCHAR(50),
	cleansing_trigger TIMESTAMP
)

CREATE TABLE transformation (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    raw_data TEXT,
    transformed_data TEXT,
    transformation_trigger VARCHAR(255) DEFAULT 'auto',
    last_transformed TIMESTAMP
);
